EmailTemplate.name: 5_15_2014 VMUG Philly Follow up.Use This One J Sharpe
EmailTemplate.subject: Philly VMUG: Thank You V-Much
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.vmturbo.com?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=header> Thank You, Turbofriend.
We saw you in Philly, and it was awesome. Thanks for chatting with us at VMUG Seattle 2014. We wanted to send you some videos that show how VMTurbo has redefined the virtual ops landscape, improving the way that world-class organizations control and automate their virtual data centers. More Videos <http://www.vmturbo.com/resources/videos-main/vmturbo-videos3?utm_source=vmturbo&utm_medium=email&utm_campaign=vmugpost> Downloads White Papers Products 500 Boylston Street, Eighth Floor, Boston, MA 02116 Tel: 866.634.5087
